content: परिमलः {@--1@} Fragrance, perfume, scent; परिमलो गीर्वाणचेतोहरः <ls>Bv. 1. 63</ls>, <ls n="Bv. 1.">66</ls>, <ls n="Bv. 1.">70</ls>, <ls n="Bv. 1.">71</ls>; <ls>Me. 25.</ls> {@--2@} Pounding or trituration of fragrant substances. {@--3@} A fragrant substance. {@--4@} Copulation; अथ परिमलजामवाप्य लक्ष्मीं <ls>Ki. 10. 1.</ls> {@--5@} A meeting of learned men. {@--6@} A stain, spot.
